title: I can't believe this is due to lack of sex education or sexual depravity.
selftext:
Why the fuck would someone do something like this? What humanly reason could there exist for someone to fuck a deadbody, that too of their mother???

[Source](https://www.timesnownews.com/mirror-now/crime/indore-man-booked-for-having-sex-with-mothers-dead-body-police-article-105735080/amp?utm_campaign=fullarticle&utm_medium=referral&utm_source=inshorts)
comments: Why did I read this disturbing post ðŸ¤¢ðŸ¤®
Ikr it's fucked up to the extreme
I have read and watched many fked up documentaries and shows about crimes like Dahmer, cannibals etc. but this one hits close to home and seriously disturbing

That's just depravity.

1 out of a billion ain't too bad.
mental diseases. Cutoff from the understanding of social pressures.
Wth
A single post ruined my whole day
My eyes my eyes....
Could be mental health issues
#WTF, this is one of the most disgusting and disturbing news I ever heard
r/noahgettheboat
Wish I could just unread it. ðŸ˜¥ðŸ˜ž
Enough reddit for today
I believe him to be mentally ill. No normally functioning human would behave this way!
I hope isnt let out into the society without a proper pysch evaluation.. he cd prove to be dangerous to other ppl.. repeat offence is highly likely
I just opened reddit today and this. Enough now, I'm going to play mini golf.
This world is sick ðŸ¤¢
What a great day to have eyesðŸ«
'Animal' insticts
Ok..that's enough internet for today.
At some point, I actually respect the law enforcement folks who deal with such shit! Cleaning up the mess of society and directing them to better life.
This guy got "caught" doing this. Imagine how many people aren't getting caught.
OP add the link to this disgusting news.
Kyonki teri society khokhli ho chuki yha vidhayk ki gadi jisme vidhayak he bhi nahi use rasta mil jat he par ambulance jaye ma judwane

All the people you can imagine, every single one, are all imaginary.

Trust that your worst fears exist in your mind, not in the world.
